channel.title: Posts on Damasukma Trihanandi
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Damasukma Trihanandi

item.title: CA With OpenSSL
item.description: Generates a private key openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:2048 -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_pubexp:3 -out privkey.pem Generates a public key openssl pkey -in privkey.pem -pubout -out pubkey.pem Generate CSR (Certificate Signing Requset) From the Existing Private Key openssl req -new -key example.key -out example.csr -subj "/C=GB/ST=London/L=London/O=Global Security/OU=IT Department/CN=example.com" Create new Private key and Generate CSR openssl req -nodes -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout example.key -out example.csr -subj "/C=GB/ST=London/L=London/O=Global Security/OU=IT Department/CN=example.com" Generete CA root openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -key rootkey.
